units.name: Crusaders
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: power weapon.

datasheet.name: Spiritual Fortitude
datasheet.description: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: ATTACHED UNIT
datasheet.description: If a CHARACTER unit from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD, it can be attached to this unit instead.|Fortification (левая колонка)||

units.name: Death Cult Assassins
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Death Cult power blades.

datasheet.name: Death Cult
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, re-roll a Wound roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Arco-flagellants
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: arco-flails.

datasheet.name: Extremis Trigger Word
datasheet.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can choose to invoke its extremis trigger word. If you do, then until the end of the phase, arco-flails equipped by models in this unit have an Attacks characteristic of 6 and the [HAZARDOUS] ability.|Datasheet||

units.name: Penitent Engines
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: penitent flamers; twin penitent buzz-blades.

datasheet.name: Endless Suffering
datasheet.description: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.|Datasheet||

units.name: Saint Celestine
units.loadout: Saint Celestine is equipped with: the Ardent Blade. Each Geminae Superia is equipped with: bolt pistol; power weapon.

datasheet.name: Healing Tears
datasheet.description: While this unit contains a Celestine model, in your Command phase, if this unit is below its Starting Strength, either one destroyed Geminae Superia model or up to D3 other Bodyguard models are returned to this unit.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Lifewards
datasheet.description: While this unit contains one or more Geminae Superia models, Celestine has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Miraculous Intervention
datasheet.description: The first time this unit’s Celestine model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set that Celestine model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.|Datasheet||

units.name: Canoness
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; hallowed chainsword.

datasheet.name: Sacred Command
datasheet.description: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: The Emperor’s Grace
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 2+ invulnerable save.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Null Rod
datasheet.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Rod of Office
datasheet.description: Each time a model in the bearer’s unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.|Wargear||

units.name: Imagifier
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Litany of Deeds
datasheet.description:
Each time you gain a Miracle dice as the result of an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit or model from your army being destroyed, if that unit or model was destroyed within 12" of this model, you can re-roll the result of that Miracle dice before adding it to your Miracle dice pool.|Datasheet||
000000900|4|||Stanchion of Holy Martyrs|While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a Save characteristic of 2+ and a 4+ invulnerable save.|Datasheet||
000000901|1|000008346||||Core||
000000901|2|000008466||||Faction||
000000901|3|||Medicus Ministorum|While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.|Datasheet||
000000901|4|||Sacred Healing|While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return up to 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to that unit. If you wish, you can first discard 1 Miracle dice; if you do, you can return up to D3+1 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) to that unit instead.|Datasheet||
000000902|1|000008346||||Core||
000000902|2|000008466||||Faction||
000000902|3|||Laud Hailer|Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.|Datasheet||

units.name: Hospitaller
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; chirurgeon’s tools.

units.name: Dialogus
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; Dialogus staff.

datasheet.name: Stirring Rhetoric
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time this model’s unit performs an Act of Faith, the value of one of the Miracle dice used in that Act of Faith is first changed to a 6.|Datasheet||

units.name: Battle Sisters Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Cherub
datasheet.description: Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith, you gain 1 Miracle dice. Designer’s Note: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Defenders of the Faith
datasheet.description: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
datasheet.description: At the end of your Command phase, for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.|Wargear||

units.name: Seraphim Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: 2 bolt pistols; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Angelic Ascent
datasheet.description:
In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.|Datasheet||
000000907|1|000008338||||Core|5+|
000000907|2|000008466||||Faction||
000000907|3|||Overseer of Redemption|While this unit contains a Repentia Superior model, each time a Sisters Repentia model in this unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.|Datasheet||
000000908|1|000008466||||Faction||
000000908|2|||Cherubs|Twice per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith, you gain 1 Miracle dice. Designer’s Note: Place two Cherub tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this ability has been used.|Datasheet||
000000908|3|||Storm of Retribution|Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If such an attack targets an enemy unit that has destroyed one or more ADEPTA SORORITAS units from your army during the battle, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.|Datasheet||
000000909|1|000008344||||Core|6"

units.name: Repentia Squad
units.loadout: The Repentia Superior is equipped with: bolt pistol; neural whips. Each Sister Repentia is equipped with: penitent eviscerator.

units.name: Retributor Squad
units.loadout: The Retributor Superior is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon. Each Retributor is equipped with: bolt pistol; heavy bolter; close combat weapon.

units.name: Dominion Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Cherub
datasheet.description: Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith, you gain 1 Miracle dice. Designer’s Note: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Righteous Awareness
datasheet.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Holy Vanguard
datasheet.description:
If this unit has a Leader unit attached to it during the Declare Battle Formations step and this unit starts the battle embarked within a TRANSPORT, that Leader unit gains the Scouts 6" ability.|Special (правая колонка)||
000000909|6|||Simulacrum Imperialis|At the end of your Command phase, for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.|Wargear||

000000912|2|000008466||||Faction||
000000912|3|||Devastating Refrain|In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with an Indirect Fire weapon scored a hit against an enemy unit, that unit must take a Battle-shock test. Each time such an attack destroys an enemy model that has the Deadly Demise ability, that model’s Deadly Demise ability inflicts mortal wounds on a D6 roll of 5+ instead of on a 6.|Datasheet||
000000912|4|||One Shot|The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.|Wargear profile||

If that attack is made with a quad-lascannon and the target can Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Triumph Of Saint Katherine
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistols; relic weapons.

datasheet.name: Simulacrum of the Ebon Chalice (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, that unit can perform up to two Acts of Faith per phase, instead of only one.|Primarch||
000002063|8|||Simulacrum of the Argent Shroud (Aura)|While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.|Primarch||

datasheet.name: Icon of the Valorous Heart (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.|Primarch||
000002063|10|||Petals of the Bloody Rose (Aura)|While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1.|Primarch||

units.name: Junith Eruita
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: twin Ministorum heavy flamer; Mace of Castigation.

datasheet.name: The Pulpit of Saint Holline’s Basilica
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Fiery Conviction
datasheet.description: If this model is on the battlefield at the start of your Command phase, you can choose one of the following:Discard 1 Miracle dice and gain 1CP.Take a Leadership test for this model, if that test is passed, gain 1CP.|Datasheet||

units.name: Zephyrim Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; power weapon.

datasheet.name: Embodied Prophecy
datasheet.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities to apply to power weapons equipped by models in this unit until the end of the phase:[SUSTAINED HITS 1][LETHAL HITS]Before making your selection, if this unit made a Charge move this turn, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. If you do, until the end of the phase, both of the abilities above apply to power weapons equipped by models in this unit.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Sacred Banner
datasheet.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.|Wargear||

units.name: Mortifiers
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: 2 heavy bolters; twin penitent buzz-blades.

datasheet.name: Anguish of the Unredeemed
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 2+, do not remove it from play; That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Anchorite Sarcophagus
datasheet.description:
The bearer has a Move characteristic of 7" and a Save characteristic of 3+.|Wargear||
000002068|1|000008339||||Core|D6|
000002068|2|000008466||||Faction||
000002068|3|||Consecrated Ground|When this FORTIFICATION is set up, all parts of it must be set up within 1" of another part. Friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY models can be set up or end any type of move on top of the floor sections of this FORTIFICATION. While an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army is within 1" of this FORTIFICATION, that unit can perform one additional Act of Faith per phase.|Datasheet||
000002068|4|||Holy Cover|Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.|Datasheet||
000002068|5|||FORTIFICATION|While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle- shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.|Primarch||
000002076|1|000008350||||Faction||
000002076|2|||Outrider Escort|Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when a friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, this unit can use this ability. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, this unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).|Datasheet||

units.loadout: This model is equipped with: nothing.

datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Rapturous Blows
datasheet.description: Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. units.name: Morvenn Vahl
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Fidelis; Paragon missile launcher; Lance of Illumination.

datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Righteous Repugnance
datasheet.description: Each time this model’s unit is selected to shoot or fight, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. If you do, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of Fidelis and the Lance of Illumination. Each time an enemy unit is destroyed by this model, you gain 1 Miracle dice.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: SUPREME COMMANDER
datasheet.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.|Special (правая колонка)||

datasheet.description: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Aestred Thurga model, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Recount the Deeds of the Saints
datasheet.description: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Agathae Dolan model, each time that unit destroys an enemy unit, you gain 1 Miracle dice. When that Agathae Dolan model is destroyed, you gain D3 Miracle dice.|Datasheet||
